editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: Missal, Mäṣǝḥafä Qǝddase, መጽሐፈ፡ ቅዳሴ፡, see MQ, መጽሐፈ፡ ቅዳሴ። በግዕዝና፡ በአማርኛ። = Mäṣḥäfä Qəddase. Bä-Gə‘əzənna bä-Amarəñña (Addis Ababa: Täsfa, 1951 E.C.); Liturgy, with musical notation. For the pertinent references and comments, see HSEA. EMIP 27. F. iir: note of gifting of the book to Church of Amba Qeddus Mika'el (Saint Mika'el). F-5r: Prayer of the Covenant, Ṣälotä Kidan, ጸሎተ፡ ኪዳን፡. F-9r: Supplications, Mästäbqwu‘ǝ, መስተብቍዕ፡. F Litany, Liṭon, ሊጦን፡, for Monday, Enzä Nä’äkwǝto, እንዘ፡ ነአኵቶ፡; Ff. Prayers over the utensils for the Mass and Preparatory Prayers, ጸሎት፡ ሶበ፡ ትሰይሞ፡ ለፃሕል፡. : The Ordinary of the Mass, ሥርዓተ፡ ቅዳሴ፡ mentions the owner, ገብረ ሕይወት. Note on the inside back cover says, This liturgy is the property Saint Mika'el (church).

origin.origDate: 1889-1914. Ff. 21v, passim, mentions Abba Qerelos (1874-1927) and Abba Matewos and (1889-1926); F. 23r mentions emperor Menilek (1889-1914)
